project1.title: NESVault
project1.description: The NESVault is my E8 Final Backend Capstone. I've always been a huge fan of retro videos games and have been an avid collector for many years. In the last five years of so, the amount of NES collectors across the globe has grown rapidly. With the limited supply of these classic games from the 80's and early 90's, the value of individual titles have begun to rise.
project1.technologiesUsed: C#, .Net, SQL, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, Axios, Firebase, CRUD, Webpack

project2.title: Booze Clues
project2.description: This is our Front End Capstone project. My app is called Booze Clues. It is a way for individuals to keep track of specific spirits, wine or beer that they try while enjoying a night out on the town, at home or on vacation. When you are in the moment of relaxation, hanging with your crew or just getting some me time in, it's easy to forget about what you're drinking. But when you taste that one bottle that you just have to have, you don't want to forget what it was.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, jQuery, Axios, Firebase, CRUD, Webpack

project3.title: Nutshell
project3.description: This is group project that was built as a single page application that incorporates Firebase CRUD to authenticate and interact with multiple components.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, Axios, Firebase, CRUD, Webpack

project4.title: Developer Portal
project4.description: This app is our first React project. It includes a GitHub Profile Card and the ability to track/add/delete development tools.
project4.technologiesUsed: HTML, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, jQuery, Axios, Firebase, CRUD, Webpack

project5.title: To-Do App
project5.description: This is a to-do app with a list of unfinished tasks. When the user visits the app, the user can log in with Google authentication to create, edit, and delete tasks. This app makes full use of CRUD axios methods with Firebase.
project5.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Webpack, Axios, Firebase, ES6 Modules, SASS, Bootstrap
